# `sys mem` for [system](/commands/categories/system.md)

<div class='command-title'>View information about the system memory.</div>

## Signature

```> sys mem {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | record |
## Examples

Show info about the system memory
```nu
> sys mem

```
